verses.roman:
eka āmra-bīja prabhu aṅgane ropila
tat-kṣaṇe janmila vṛkṣa bāḍite lāgila

synonyms: eka—one; āmra-bīja—seed of a mango; prabhu—the Lord; aṅgane—in the yard; ropila—sowed; tat-kṣaṇe—immediately; janmila—fructified; vṛkṣa—a tree; bāḍite—to grow; lāgila—began.
translation: The Lord then sowed a mango seed in the yard, and immediately the seed fructified into a tree and began to grow.
